SELECT my_case_type as myCaseType ,
FROM USER AS a INNER JOIN (SELECT *,(CASE WHEN case_type LIKE 'T%' THEN 'T' ELSE case_type END) AS my_case_type FROM closing_list_table) AS b ON b.prospector_code=a.username GROUP BY my_case_type ORDER BY my_case_type DESC;
select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(risk_time, '%Y' ) as year from closing_list_table ORDER BY year DESC

SELECT b.surveyor AS userName, (SELECT group_name FROM group_p WHERE id=(SELECT group_id FROM USER WHERE user.username=b.prospector_code)) AS groupName,
FROM USER AS a INNER JOIN (SELECT *,(CASE WHEN case_type LIKE 'T%' THEN 'T' ELSE case_type END) AS my_case_type FROM closing_list_table) AS b ON b.prospector_code=a.username where group_id=#{groupId} GROUP BY userName ,group_id ORDER BY group_id ASC
SELECT CASE WHEN case_type LIKE 'T%' THEN 'T' ELSE case_type END AS closingListCaseType FROM closing_list_table GROUP BY closingListCaseType;
